ModMetaData.name: More Traits
ModMetaData.author: HackerLaastad
ModMetaData.description:
More Traits is a mod that focuses on 1 goal, to bring more variety into your games and your pawns.
The traits you saw in the description is not all of them because im unable to write anymore beyond that point. so any traits i add now will just be left up to you to discover.
Have Fun, if you feel something needs to be changed or rebalanced feel free to leave your suggestion.
Current Number of Traits: 95
